name: Play with Gilbert
description: Meet Gilbert. A very curious cat who loves to go on adventures. Play with Gilbert is a sandbox game aimed at young children (Ages 3+) in order to help them get familiarized with 3D games and gameplay.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.00 GHz / AMD CPU 3 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB (AMD Radeon HD 7970 or Nvidia GeForce 1060) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 2.5 GHz / AMD CPU 3,5 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB (AMD GPU: AMD Radeon R9 200 Series or Nvidia GPU: Nvidia GeForce 1080) DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 9 GB available space
